items.title: Samsung refutes claims of '80% price hike' across all memory products â€” leaks and rumors denied by Samsung PR amidst historic RAM shortages
items.summary: Samsung today refuted claims from the internet that it was set to raise prices on all memory products by 80%. The claims, circulating on X, were quickly refuted by Samsung itself, but the messy RAM market still doesn't look any better for it.

items.title: Google Search AI Mode can use Gmail and Photos to get to know you
items.summary: Personal Intelligence can tap into your Gmail inbox to check for bookings and purchase receipts. Google is helping AI Mode to provide more personalized responses in Search by allowing the chatbot to analyze your Gmail and Google Photos accounts. After launching for Gemini AI last week, "Personal Inâ€¦
